creator: jian.cai@sun.com
text:
Tomcat-product-test (test case ListenerSATE) calls four JSPs to test the
session attribute event. The request sequence is:
	add Attribute1 to session
	add Attribute2 to session
	replace Attribute1 in session
	remove Attribute2 in session

When manually test (input the request in location bar one-by-one), the result is
OK. The log file is:

Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset1: attributeReplaced('', 'SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset2: attributeReplaced('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset3: attributeReplaced('', 'SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset1: attributeReplaced('', 'SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset2: attributeReplaced('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset3: attributeReplaced('', 'SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset1: attributeRemoved('', 'SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset2: attributeRemoved('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset3: attributeRemoved('', 'SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')


However, when the four requests were run in test suite consecutively, the log
file was like:

Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr1', 'SessionValue1')
Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'SessionValue2')
Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset1: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset2: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')
Listenerset3: attributeAdded('SessionAttr2', 'newsessionAttribute')

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
One possible cause for this would be if the JSP pages were not being recognized 
as being part of the same session when run under your test suite.  Is this 
possible?

Would it be possible to provide the source code for your test suite?  I want to 
add some equivalent tests to the unit tests for Tomcat itself.

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
Turned out to be that the test client was not propogating session identity to
the subsequent requests.
